sections.heading: 13 through 16 of this act shall be known and may be cited as the "Drunk Driving Prevention Act"
sections.text: Added by Laws 1995, c. 320, ยง 1, eff. July 1, 1995. Amended by Laws 1996, c. 309, ยง 2, eff. Nov. 1, 1996; Laws 2000, 1st Ex.Sess., c. 8, ยง 13, eff. July 1, 2000. Renumbered from ยง 6-106.1 of this title by
